summary:
changes all races to beast races from the custom beast race mods

best used with one of the tropical overhaul mods

will be cahnging the children soon and adding children for each race and adoption friendly
descriptionHtml:
this mod changes all the non beast races to the beast races listed below currently children are not changed much but soon they will be


Here are all the sources that was used to compile this mod. you must have all the mods downloaded for their meshes and textures
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Cats of Skyrim by Fluffy
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14379/?
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Fennec fox race by Jelly
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=234034337
-----------------------------------------------------------------
The Lungaris by Mickyan
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37870
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Vaalsark by Wolf of the Azar
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13561/
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Vukasin by ArcicCarnage
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56328/
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Lykaios Race Legacy by KrittaKitty
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64466/?
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Kygarra by Wolf of the Azar
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61555
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Nezumi by hillbilly107
http://www.loverslab.com/topic/29421-nezumi-skyrim-ratrace/
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Tsaesci Race by SpikeDragonLord
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56219/?
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Argonian Fins by Chilean Wolf
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55707/?
-----------------------------------------------------------------
RS Children Overhaul by Ranaline
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55555/?

 (required for the children to look properly)-----------------------------------------------------------------Skykids by en_hawk
http://www.loverslab.com/topic/22395-wip-skykids-child-races-other-technical-goodies-fixed-download-linksmore-compatibility-patches21915/
(Only install meshes and textures dont use the scripts or .esp/.esm files.                              I only use the beast race Meshes from this mod)
author: Elfendrago
